languages.text: "Вам уже доводилось встречаться со служителями Кровавой паутины, Лорд-капитан. Их мрачную процессию до сих пор вспоминают на верхних палубах".
"You have already met the servants of the Bloodspun Web, Lord Captain. Their grim procession is not one the upper decks will soon forget."
languages.original_text: "Вам уже доводилось встречаться со служителями Кровавой паутины, Лорд-капитан. Их мрачную процессию до сих пор вспоминают на верхних палубах".

traits.locale_text: "You have already met the servants of the Bloodspun Web, Lord Captain. Their grim procession is not one the upper decks will soon forget."
"You have already met the servants of the Bloodspun Web, Lord Captain. Their grim procession is not one the upper decks will soon forget."

"You have already met the servants of the Bloodspun Web, Lord Captain. Their grim procession is not one the upper decks will soon forget."

languages.text: « Vous avez déjà rencontré les serviteurs de la Toile de Sang, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Leur sinistre procession a durablement marqué les esprits des ponts supérieurs. »
languages.original_text: "You have already met the servants of the Bloodspun Web, Lord Captain. Their grim procession is not one the upper decks will soon forget."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez déjà rencontré les serviteurs de la Toile de Sang, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Leur sinistre procession a durablement marqué les esprits des ponts supérieurs. »

languages.text: «Ya conoce a los sirvientes de la Red Sanguinolenta, Lord Capitán. Las cubiertas superiores tardarán en olvidar su procesión siniestra».
languages.original_text: "You have already met the servants of the Bloodspun Web, Lord Captain. Their grim procession is not one the upper decks will soon forget."

traits.locale_text: «Ya conoce a los sirvientes de la Red Sanguinolenta, Lord Capitán. Las cubiertas superiores tardarán en olvidar su procesión siniestra».

languages.text: “您已经见过织血罗网的仆人了，舰长大人。上层甲板的成员恐怕不会轻易忘记那些可怕的家伙。”
languages.original_text: "You have already met the servants of the Bloodspun Web, Lord Captain. Their grim procession is not one the upper decks will soon forget."

traits.locale_text: “您已经见过织血罗网的仆人了，舰长大人。上层甲板的成员恐怕不会轻易忘记那些可怕的家伙。”

languages.text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブの使用人にはもうお会いになりましたね、ロード・キャプテン。その厳かな行進は、上層部も忘れることはないのだろう」
languages.original_text: "You have already met the servants of the Bloodspun Web, Lord Captain. Their grim procession is not one the upper decks will soon forget."

traits.locale_text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブの使用人にはもうお会いになりましたね、ロード・キャプテン。その厳かな行進は、上層部も忘れることはないのだろう」

languages.text: "Ihr seid den Dienern des Blutgesponnenen Netzes bereits begegnet, Lord Captain. Die Oberdecks werden ihre düstere Prozession nicht so bald vergessen."
languages.original_text: "You have already met the servants of the Bloodspun Web, Lord Captain. Their grim procession is not one the upper decks will soon forget."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid den Dienern des Blutgesponnenen Netzes bereits begegnet, Lord Captain. Die Oberdecks werden ihre düstere Prozession nicht so bald vergessen."

languages.text: "Kanipi Ağı'nın hizmetkârlarıyla hâlihazırda karşılaştınız Lord Kaptan. Kasvetli törenleri, üst güvertelerin öyle kolay kolay unutacakları türden bir şey değil."
languages.original_text: "You have already met the servants of the Bloodspun Web, Lord Captain. Their grim procession is not one the upper decks will soon forget."
